trans-unit.target: Small Fish in a Big Pond<tab>Requirement: Score 2,500 points or higher.
Big Fish in a Small Pond<tab>Requirement: Score 5,000 points or higher.
A Rare Catch<tab>Requirement: Catch a ★★★★ fish.
Catch of a Lifetime<tab>Requirement: Catch a ★★★★★ fish.
Give a Man a Fish<tab>Requirement: Catch 15 or more fish when a spectral current is present.
Teach a Man to Fish<tab>Requirement: Catch 35 or more fish when a spectral current is present.
Bream Team: Galadion Bay<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 10 or more different fish in Galadion Bay.
Bream Team: Southern Strait of Merlthor<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 10 or more different fish in the southern Strait of Merlthor.

Bream Team: Rhotano Sea<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 10 or more different fish in the Rhotano Sea.
Fabled Fishers<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 3 or more ★★★★★ fish.
Favored by Llymlaen<tab>Requirement: Cause a spectral current to occur.
Octopus Travelers<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 150 or more octopodes.
Certifiable Shark Hunters<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 200 or more sharks.
Jelled Together<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 150 or more jellyfish.
Maritime Dragonslayers<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 100 or more seahorses.
Ocean Fishing Amateur<tab>Requirement: Complete one mission during an ocean fishing voyage.
Ocean Fishing Enthusiast<tab>Requirement: Complete two missions during an ocean fishing voyage.
Ocean Fishing Fanatic<tab>Requirement: Complete three missions during an ocean fishing voyage.
Balloon Catchers<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 250 or more fugu.
Crab Boat Crew<tab>Requirement: As a party, catch 250 or more crabs.
Sticking it to the Manta<tab>Requirement: As an individual, catch 25 or more mantas.
